articles.author: Claire Jiao
articles.title: China's Stubborn Manufacturing Slump Drags Down the Rest of Asia - Bloomberg
articles.description: Manufacturing across most of Asia deteriorated further in June as a weak Chinese economy sapped demand for the region’s goods.
articles.content:
Manufacturing across most of Asia deteriorated further in June as a weak Chinese economy sapped demand for the region’s goods.
